id.comment: Queries 1 - 3 - Test Follows relation. First stmt Follows - false

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(s, 1)

id.comment: Lasst stmt Followed by - false

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(23, s)

id.comment: Reverse stmt# - false

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(2, 1)

id.comment: Queries 4 - 6 - Test Follows* relation. First stmt Follows* - false

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(s, 1)

id.comment: Last stmt Followed* by - false

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(23, s)

id.comment: Reverse stmt# - false

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(18, 2)

id.comment: Queries 7 - 9 - Test Parent relation. Reverse stmt# - false

query.querystr: print pn; Select pn such that Parent(10, 4)

id.comment: Stmt in different container - false

query.querystr: print pn; Select pn such that Parent(6, 14)

id.comment: Last stmt is parent - false

query.querystr: print pn; Select pn such that Parent(23, _)

id.comment: Queries 10 - 12 - Test Parent* relation. Reverse stmt# - false

query.querystr: read r; Select r such that Parent*(15, 12)

id.comment: Stmt in different container - false

query.querystr: read r; Select r such that Parent*(4, 15)

id.comment: Last stmt is parent - false

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(23, s)

id.comment: Queries 13 - 15 - Test Uses relation. assign modified but not used - false

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a such that Uses(2, v)

id.comment: Uses read stmt - false

query.querystr: read r; variable v; Select r such that Uses(r, v)

id.comment: Container variable modified but not used - false

query.querystr: procedure proc; Select proc such that Uses(22, glass)

id.comment: Queries 16 - 18 - Test Modifies relation. assign used but not modified - false

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Modifies(a, "z")

id.comment: Modifies print stmt - false

query.querystr: print pn; variable v; Select pn such that Modifies(pn, v)

id.comment: Container variable used but not modified - false

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Modifies(20, stat)

id.comment: Queries 19 - 21 - Test pattern assign relation. Select result not related - false

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select w pattern a("glass", _)

id.comment: Select assign related - false

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"basket"_)

id.comment: Select variable related - false

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"x"_)

id.comment: Queries 22 - 39 - Test s.t. and p.a. combinations for each s.t. clause. Select result not related, Follows and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; while w; Select s such that Follows(s, w) pattern a(_, _"rock"_)

id.comment: Select result related to 1 clause, Follows and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Follows(4, 5) pattern a(_, _"toe"_)

id.comment: Select result related to both, Follows and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Follows(a, _) pattern a("stat", _)

id.comment: Select result not related, Follows* and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"tac"_) such that Follows*(0, 24)

id.comment: Select result related to 1 clause, Follows* and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v such that Follows*(3, 19) pattern a(v, _"glass"_)

id.comment: Select result related to both, Follows* and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Follows*(a, 30) pattern a("y", _)

id.comment: Select result not related, Parent and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; while w; read r; Select r pattern a("stat", _"toe"_) such that Parent(w, _)

id.comment: Select result related to 1 clause, Parent and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; read r; Select a pattern a(_, _) such that Parent(r, _)

id.comment: Select result related to both, Parent and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a such that Parent(a, _) pattern a(v, _"sub"_)

id.comment: Select result not related, Parent* and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; if ifs; Select v pattern a("y", _) such that Parent*(4, ifs)

id.comment: Select result related to 1 clause, Parent* and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Parent*(_, a) pattern a("paper", _)

id.comment: Select result related to both, Parent* and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Parent*(a, _) pattern a(_, _)

id.comment: Select result not related, Uses and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a, a1; variable v; stmt s; Select a1 such that Uses(s, v) pattern a(_, _"glass"_)

id.comment: Select result related to 1 clause, Uses and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; stmt s; Select v pattern a(v, _) such that Uses(s, "glass")

id.comment: Select result related to both, Uses and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v such that Uses(1, v) pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Select result not related, Modifies and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; procedure proc; read r; Select proc such that Modifies(r, "x") pattern a(_, _)

id.comment: Select result related to 1 clause, Modifies and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select s such that Modifies(s, _) pattern a("stat", _)

id.comment: Select result related to both, Modifies and pattern assign, 1 clause fail

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"x"_) such that Modifies(a, v)

id.comment: Select result related to both, Modifies and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; stmt s; Select v pattern a(v, _"tac"_) such that Modifies(s, v)

id.comment: Select result related to both,

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; stmt s; Select s pattern a(v, _"tac"_) such that Modifies(s, v)

id.comment: Select result related to both, Uses and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; stmt s; Select s pattern a(v, _"tac"_) such that Uses(s, v)

id.comment: Select result not related to both, Uses and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; stmt s; Select s pattern a(v, _"tac"_) such that Uses(s, "tac")

id.comment: Select result related to both, Uses and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; stmt s; Select a pattern a(v, _"tac"_) such that Uses(a, "tac")

id.comment: Select result related to both, Uses and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; stmt s; Select v pattern a(v, _"tac"_) such that Uses(s, v)
